text: viśvasiccatin śēṣaṁ allāhuvil aviśvasiccavarārēā avaruṭe -taṅṅaḷuṭe hr̥dayaṁ viśvāsattil samādhānaṁ pūṇṭatāyirikke nirbandhikkappeṭṭavaralla; pratyuta, tuṟanna manas'sēāṭe aviśvāsaṁ svīkariccavarārēā avaruṭe- mēl allāhuviṅkal ninnuḷḷa kēāpamuṇṭāyirikkuṁ. avarkk bhayaṅkaramāya śikṣayumuṇṭāyirikkuṁ
